channel.title: [317] Coding Help [317]
channel.description:
Source i use : Pkerslyfe, Source Version: 317
Problem: Well i want to add so if i log in The Coder "Name" has logged in, I might have to good code, But i dont know where to put it..
I have this code,
[code]if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name me noob")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "The Coder, Name me noob has just logged in.";[/code]

item.title: [317] Coding Help [317]
item.dc:creator: @schwimmer4 schwimmer4
item.description:
@schwimmer4 wrote:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Inser name")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Server Owner & Coder & Hoster (Insert Name) Has Loged In!.";

or if a admin mod or co-owner logs in:

Mod:

if (playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Moderator, " + playerName + " has logged in"; }

admin:

if (playerRights == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Administrator " + playerName + " has logged in"; }

owner:

if (playerRights == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner / Co-Owner, " + playerName + " has logged in!"; }

Regular Player:

if (playerRights == 0) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "" + playerName + " has logged in";

Put this in your client.java file.

I hope i could help

Read full topic
